title: EuroCrossAcademy: Finding Motivation from Fun
content:
USA Cycling and EuroCrossAcademy (ECA) are collaborating to further cyclocross junior development throughout the 2023-2024 season. The common goal of USA Cycling and ECA is to focus on a longterm, holistic foundation for junior athletes through a character-driven curriculum and a process-to-performance philosophy. The project’s objectives are to build a strong presence on the world cup stage … Continued

Read the full article at EuroCrossAcademy: Finding Motivation from Fun on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
